info.name: Flat Steam UI
info.description:
Flat, clean and simply Steam Store and Community redesign. More squared and geometry-focused flat design, global UI and style fixes, and new modern vision.
Make your Steam better!

Extensions support - Enhanced Steam, SteamDB, Steam Economy Enhancer.
info.additionalInfo: Please, use GitHub or Steam Group for submit your request or issues. You can support my work with a donation. Your donation will help me continue and improve this project. At least, you can buy me a beer :) via PayPal.

data.title: Edited: Pretty neat! But here's a few suggestions to fix.
[Bug & Suggestions] Profile issue & dark theme and enhanced steam button?
Store widget don't need padding on <body>
